# Holdings

Holdings are the larger centres of civilisation in the realm.

There are four in this realm:

- [Klaegcasleen](/holdings/klaegcasleen.qmd) (Kla-cleen)
    - Castle
    - Location: R8-C8
    - Importance: Holds the seat of power
- [Bochordil](/holdings/bochordil.qmd) (Back-or-dill)
    - Tower
    - Location: R1-C5
    - Importance: Library and protection from invaders from the north (The Eminent Realm, see [History](/history/first_age.qmd))
- [Fabriknock](/holdings/fabriknock.qmd) (Fa-bree-knock)
    - Town
    - Location: R5-C12
    - Importance: Primary source of forged metals in the realm
- [Inis Ocular](/holdings/inis_ocular.qmd) (Inn-ish Awk-you-lar)
    - Fortress
    - Location: R11-C12
    - Importance: Trade port for the realm to other realms across the sea.
